column4: Q: I am using Ubuntu server 10.04.1 and what I am finding is that when I ftp files into /var/www and then ftp them back to my client machine, they appear to be corrupt - this is mainly apparent with .gif .jpg and any other binary files. It≈õ as though they are being ftp in text mode, but the ftp client confirms that they are being transferred in binary mode. Guys, what gives? I have set up many servers in the past and not had this problem, b
ut am having the problem in 10.04.1 - Suggestions please?
are you going from windows to *nix, then back?
sorry I don't pm, I didn't even notice that you did it until just now.
